# Zepoul Ayiti (GL Zepoul Peyi)

Official website: https://zepoulayiti.com/
Primary language: French (fr), Haitian Creole (ht), English (en)
Business type: Egg production and B2B distribution in Haiti

## What we offer
- Fresh eggs supply for restaurants, hotels, hospitals, and institutions
- Wholesale egg distribution in Haiti
- Recurring supply planning and fast quotation
